loseAccess: Make sure you don't lose access to your account
chooseLanguage: Choose between English, MƒÅori, or Portugese.
languagesNote: Please note that languages are a work in progress, we welcome your suggestions and feedback.
defaultStorageOption: By default Ahau will download and keep a copy of all information and files you have accessed. It does this so content is available offline, and it creates copy of the information for safe keeping
excludeStorageOption: Do not keep artefacts (photos, files or videos) on this device. You will still be able to access them while online but may be slower (this is not recommended)
pruneStorageOption: Old photos and videos will be automatically deleted to make space for new ones when this limit is reached
